DOC.brief_summary: After initial hemodynamic stabilization , 36 septic shock patient heart rate > 90 bpm require norepinephrine maintain mean arterial pressure ( MAP ) 65 mmHg randomise two group , esmolol group control group . Patients allocate esmolol group receive continuous esmolol infusion maintain lower heart rate 10 % . Norepinephrine titrate achieve MAP 65 mmHg . To investigate myocardial performance , investigator assess Tissue Doppler image echocardiography hemodynamic measure . Data obtain baseline , esmolol infusion achieve predefined heart rate threshold 72hours esmolol infusion .
